other_nodes.name: Flex Supreme Program
other_nodes.description: The Flex Supreme Program is designed for the most qualified borrowers from an income and credit standpoint, with less complex transactions. Refer to the Flex Supreme Matrix for LTVs, minimum and maximum loan amounts, etc. The provided tables detail lending guidelines, outlining eligibility criteria for various loan types (purchase, cash-out refinance, rate/term refinance) across different property types and borrower profiles (primary residence, second home, investment property). Key factors influencing eligibility include credit score, loan-to-value ratio (LTV), debt-to-income ratio (DTI), occupancy type, and the borrower's income documentation (wage earner vs. self-employed). Stricter requirements exist for cash-out refinances and investment properties, often featuring lower maximum LTVs and higher minimum credit score thresholds. Income verification methods vary depending on employment status, with self-employment requiring more extensive documentation.

other_nodes.name: Flex Supreme Program

Key factors influencing eligibility include credit score, loan-to-value ratio (LTV), debt-to-income ratio (DTI), occupancy type, and the borrower's income documentation (wage earner vs. self-employed). Stricter requirements exist for cash-out refinances and investment properties, often featuring lower maximum LTVs and higher minimum credit score thresholds. Income verification methods vary depending on employment status, with self-employment requiring more extensive documentation.

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • Max 6% OO/SH
filtered_requirements.name: IPCs

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • Not permitted
filtered_requirements.name: Buydown (Purchase Only)

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• Permitted on 1-Unit: OO after 5%; and SH & NOO after 10% contribution 
• OO & SH: 100% gift funds for down payment/closing costs when <= 75% LTV. 
• For NOO, gift funds allowed after 10% contribution regardless of LTV. 
• Gift funds are not permitted to be used towards reserves 
• Gifts of Equity are ineligible
filtered_requirements.name: Gift Funds

filtered_requirements.raw_value: •• 48 Months  /  FTHB 84 Months + Max 43% DTI
filtered_requirements.name: Credit Event Seasoning

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • Primary, Second Homes (1-unit), Investment Properties
filtered_requirements.name: Occupancy

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• <=70 LTV: Unlimited or if >70 LTV: $500,000 
• >= 6 mos seasoning from last transaction. Not permitted in declining markets
filtered_requirements.name: Cash-Out Limits

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• 1-Unit SFR/PUD (1 or more ADUs) 
• 2-4 Units (with 1 ADU) Max 75% LTV - FTHB not permitted 
• Condo (Warrantable only) Max 75% 
• Non-Warrantable Condos and Condotels are not permitted 
• Rural Properties - OO only, Max 70% LTV, Cash-out ineligible (See Guides) 
• Leasehold not permitted 
• Max 10 Acres
filtered_requirements.name: Property Type

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• Tradeline requirements are not waived when the Primary has 3 credit scores. All 
borrowers must meet: 
• 3x12 or 2x24 or 2-yrs+ mortgage history
filtered_requirements.name: Minimum Tradelines

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
5• <= $500K = 3 months PITIA
• > $500K - $1.5M = 6 months PITIA
• > $1.5M - $2.5M = 9 months PITIA
• > $2.5M- $3.5M = 12 months PITIA
• Cash-out may satisfy reserves
• When Asset Utilization is the sole source of income, reserves are not required
filtered_requirements.name: Reserves

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • 5% LTV reduction off matrix LTV.
filtered_requirements.name: Declining Markets

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• US Citizens 
• Permanent Resident Alien 
• Non-Permanent Resident (H1B & L1) Max 75% LTV 
• Non-Occupant Co-Borrower for OO only to max 43% DTI, C/O not permitted 
• FTHB: 0x30x24, <= 43% DTI, I/O not permitted, 84 mos cred event seasoning
filtered_requirements.name: Borrower Eligibility

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • 0x30x12  /  FTHB 0x30x24
filtered_requirements.name: Housing/Rental History

filtered_requirements.raw_value: • 30-days / Asset Utilization 90-days
filtered_requirements.name: Asset Seasoning

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• 1ppl = $1.5K, 2ppl = $2.5K 
• +150 per additional household member
filtered_requirements.name: HPML

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• O/O and 2nd Homes, 660 Minimum Score: up to 80% LTV.
• CA: in addition to the above, Min Score 700, if > 80% up to 85% LTV Full Doc/Purchase only 1-Unit.
• Business Purpose loans: 660 Minimum Score.
filtered_requirements.name: Escrow Waiver

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• Required on NOO only when permitted. See the “Business Purpose Licensing & PPP Restrictions” PDF in the Docs Tab in the Client Portal.
• No PPP – Correspondent Only
filtered_requirements.name: Prepayment Penalty

filtered_requirements.raw_value:
• Full Doc:  Wage Earner W-2 (1-2yrs) 
• Self-employment requires the most recent consecutive 2 full years in the same 
business. 
• Full Doc:  Self-Employed (1-2yrs) 
• Alt Doc:  Personal Bank Statements (1-2yrs) 
• Alt Doc:  Business/Co-Mingled Bank Statements (1-2yrs) 
• Alt Doc: Asset Utilization (84 months; standalone only; supplemental income not 
permitted) 
• Alt Doc: IRS Form 1099 (2-yrs only) – 10% Fixed Exp Ratio 
NOTE: VVOE w/in 10-days and S/E Business existence w/in 30-days

filtered_requirements.value: Wage Earner, Self-Employed, or Business Owner documentation required

filtered_requirements.raw_value:

results.reasoning: This condition applies to FHA loans with 3-4 unit properties requiring 3 months of reserves and self-sufficiency testing. The submitted loan is for Flex Supreme program, not FHA. Property address shows single-family residential (23675 PARK CAPRI, CALABASAS, CA). This condition does not apply to this loan program.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - condition not applicable to Supreme program

results.reasoning: This condition requires documentation of short-term rental verification. The URLA 1003 shows no indication of short-term rental income or business purpose related to rental activities. For a Flex Supreme W2 borrower, this condition would only apply if rental income were being used to qualify. No such income is documented in submitted materials.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - no short-term rental income documented

results.reasoning: This condition requires documentation of child support payments. The submitted loan is for Flex Supreme program, not Conventional. No child support liabilities are documented in the credit report or URLA 1003 liabilities section. This condition does not apply to Supreme program or if no child support obligations exist.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - condition not applicable to Supreme program

results.reasoning: This condition requires proof of wire receipt by escrow/title company when assets are wired to title at closing. No documentation in the submitted materials indicates wire transfer of funds to title. Without evidence of this specific transaction occurring, this condition is not applicable.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - no wire transfers documented

results.reasoning: This condition specifically applies to VA IRRRL (Loan Reduction Refinance Loan) transactions. The submitted loan is for Flex Supreme program with a W2 borrower. There is no indication this is a VA loan or VA IRRRL transaction. This condition does not apply.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - condition applies only to VA IRRRL loans

results.reasoning: This condition applies to Select Prime loan program only. The submitted loan is for Flex Supreme program. Additionally, no rental income is documented in the URLA 1003 or other materials. This condition does not apply to this Supreme program loan.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - condition not applicable to Supreme program

The extracted data clearly shows the borrower signature fields are false/empty, and there is no evidence of loan officer signature. This must be corrected before proceeding.

While a bank statement is provided, the FHA-specific requirements (most recent statement with all pages, large deposits sourced per agency guidelines, previous month ending balance) do not apply to Supreme program.

deficiencies.requirement: Business Purpose and Occupancy Certifications executed by all Borrowers
deficiencies.issue: Borrower Certification as to Business Purpose is signed by MARISOL DELGADO (dateSigned: 2025-11-04), but the primary borrower listed in URLA 1003 and Credit Report is RAMIN DAILAMY, not Marisol Delgado. The certification is for the wrong borrower.

deficiencies.evidence: Business Purpose Certification shows Marisol Delgado signature; URLA 1003 primary borrower is Ramin Dailamy. Name mismatch indicates document may not apply to this borrower.

results.reasoning: The Business Purpose Certification document is present and signed, but there is a critical mismatch between the signer name (Marisol Delgado) and the primary borrower in the loan application (Ramin Dailamy). For a Supreme program, the business purpose disclosure must be executed by the actual loan borrowers. This discrepancy indicates either the wrong document was submitted or there is confusion about borrower identity.
results.actionable_instruction: Verify borrower identity and obtain correct Business Purpose Certification
documents_checked: Borrower Certification as to Business Purpose

results.reasoning: This condition applies to FHA Solar Energy (SWT - Solar/Wind Technology) loans requiring escrow holdback documentation and completion requirements. The submitted loan is for Flex Supreme program, not FHA. No solar/wind technology financing is indicated. This condition does not apply to this Supreme program loan.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - condition applies only to FHA SWT loans

results.reasoning: This condition applies to Flex Supreme loans using rental income. It specifies that income from subject property 1-4 family owner-occupied property may not be used on a purchase. The URLA 1003 shows no rental income being used to qualify the borrower. No rental properties or income are documented. This condition does not apply as no rental income is being used.
results.actionable_instruction: No action required - no rental income documented

deficiencies.issue: No Preliminary Title Commitment or Title Commitment document is included in submitted materials. Title Invoice is present but is an invoice/billing document, not a title commitment.
deficiencies.evidence: Submitted documents do not contain Title Commitment or Preliminary Report. Only Title Invoice (billing document) is present.

results.reasoning: This is a corrective condition indicating the property title commitment was deficient or missing. The required document (Preliminary Title Commitment with 24-month chain of title) is not present in submissions. Only a Title Invoice (billing document from title company) is submitted, which does not satisfy this requirement. The actual title commitment document must be obtained from the title company.
results.actionable_instruction: Obtain executed Preliminary Title Commitment with 24-month chain of title

Additionally, the large deposit flag indicates significant deposits that require sourcing documentation, which is missing. The borrower identity discrepancy between RAMIN DAILAMY in the application and MARISOL DELGADO in the business purpose certification adds to the compliance concern.

deficiencies.evidence: Business Purpose Certification shows Marisol Delgado signature; URLA 1003 primary borrower is Ramin Dailamy. Name mismatch indicates document may not apply to this borrower.

deficient_conditions.reasoning: The Business Purpose Certification document is present and signed, but there is a critical mismatch between the signer name (Marisol Delgado) and the primary borrower in the loan application (Ramin Dailamy). For a Supreme program, the business purpose disclosure must be executed by the actual loan borrowers. This discrepancy indicates either the wrong document was submitted or there is confusion about borrower identity.
deficient_conditions.actionable_instruction: Verify borrower identity and obtain correct Business Purpose Certification
documents_checked: Borrower Certification as to Business Purpose

deficiencies.requirement: Preliminary Title Commitment with 24-month Chain of Title. Must be signed by authorized agent and dated within 90 days prior to closing.

deficient_conditions.reasoning: This is a corrective condition indicating the property title commitment was deficient or missing. The required document (Preliminary Title Commitment with 24-month chain of title) is not present in submissions. deficient_conditions.reasoning: The bank statement requirements for Conventional program are not fully met. Two complete months of statements are required, but only one month is submitted.
